summary: Implements a Keras layer that performs a 1‑D depthwise convolution, applying an independent kernel to each input channel (with optional depth multiplier) and concatenating the results, optionally followed by bias addition and activation.
business_intent: Provides an efficient, parameter‑light way to extract channel‑specific features in sequence or time‑series models, supporting separable convolution architectures and enabling flexible stride, padding, and dilation configurations.
